subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay’s bullpen shut down Boston for the second day in a row, leading the surging Rays, winners of six of their last seven, to a 3-2 victory over the visiting Red Sox.
snippet: Tampa Bay’s bullpen shut down Boston for the second day in a row, leading the surging Rays, winners of six of their last seven, to a 3-2 victory over the visiting Red Sox.
